page.title: 12A DAY WITH THE DOUGLASSES
page.content: A typical Monday starts at about 7.30am.I prepare breakfast,my husband and two daughters wash and dress.After breakfast and seeing my husband go to his occupation as an engineer,and my daughters to thier respective senior and junior schools,I complete the daily chores. Afterwards I go for a walk to a point of local interest, visiting a friend for coffee on the return journey. Home for mid_day to prepare lunch I accompany my youngest daughter to school to perform voluntary, general auxilary duties. Return home at 3.45pm.to prepare and serve the evening meal. Afterwards my daughters depart to dancing class, myself to Keep-fit and my husband to Drama classes.The day ends with family conversation, or occasionally, television viewing.
